name: Afraid to Turn (LD48)
description:
Find a cure deep in the forest before you fully transition into a werewolf!

How To Play:

Collect 5 golden berries and given them to the wizard. He will give you a potion that will cure you.

If you fail to do this in time, you will fully transform into a werewolf and will not be able to return to human form.

Controls:

- WASD or ARROWS to move

- AIM with RIGHT MOUSE

- THROW with LEFT MOUSE

- PICKUP / INTERACT with SPACE / E

- Q to cycle help text

Tips:

- The deeper into the woods you go, the more golden berries there are

- Avoid the huge wolf. It takes 3 hits with a rock to go down

- If you look carefully, you can see the wolf peeking out of the woods. Throw a rock at its eyes to scare it away

- You can also press buttons frantically to punch and kick if he is on top of you

- Transformed limbs will give you bonuses to movement speed and throwing strength
